body_html:
For me, I had the CPU version running on ubuntu 64bit. I had the same error "AttributeError: type object 'NewBase' has no attribute 'is_abstract' "

I fixed it simply by running easy_install3 -U six while inside the activated virtualenv. Hope that helps
body_text:
For me, I had the CPU version running on ubuntu 64bit. I had the same error "AttributeError: type object 'NewBase' has no attribute 'is_abstract' "
I fixed it simply by running easy_install3 -U six while inside the activated virtualenv. Hope that helps
body:
For me, I had the CPU version running on ubuntu 64bit. I had the same error "AttributeError: type object 'NewBase' has no attribute 'is_abstract' " 

I fixed it simply by running `easy_install3 -U six` while inside the activated virtualenv. Hope that helps
